markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Shei (The Ibis Matron)](/Deities.aspx?ID=127)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 128 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Any deity that would grant the dreaming potential spell as a domain spell instead grants cloak of colors._

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Empyreal Lords
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=10)

**Edicts** Empower local communities, learn from elders, share and teach from experiences

**Anathema** Force others to follow your path, inflict negative damage, age others or steal life with magic

**Follower Alignments**
LG, NG, CG

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)

**Favored Weapon** [Sickle](/Weapons.aspx?ID=9)

**Domains** [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=11), [Freedom](/Domains.aspx?ID=14), [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=15), [Perfection](/Domains.aspx?ID=26)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Liberating Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=580)

- **3rd**
[Hypercognition](/Spells.aspx?ID=156)

- **5th**
[Dreaming Potential](/Spells.aspx?ID=91)

</column>
name: Shei (The Ibis Matron)
